Articles.Content: Ok, this might sound a bit personal but plz list your 3 favorite songs and nation you use (if in rp) because I want to make a music video for every contry
Just use my anthem or The Matrix Soundtrack - Clubbed To Death.

My anthem (Makavi) please. However, if you insist:

Ready to Die

Bohemian Rhapsody

Invisible Man or Scatman\'s World

Yeah, mine are

Somebody that I used to know- goyte

1999-prince

Don\'t you want me- human league

There are so many songs in the world I couldn\'t possibly pick 3 favourites...

I\'ll just write down the first three that come to mind instead:

TNT - AC/DC

Gold Digger - Kanye West

Emily - Joanna Newsom

... I promise you, those were the first three to vividly come to mind. I know it\'s an odd mix.

I hate these kinds of questions, but here goes:

Echoes - Pink Floyd

Air on the G string (piano) - Bach

Time - Pink Floyd

I\'m a Pink Floyd fan :b

music thread eh?

I seriously cant come up with 3 favorite songs. Its too hard

EIGWHWIUGHF

3???

Um. Okay here are 3 from 3 of my favorite types of music.

(no promises I\'m keeping this to 3)

1rst Genre/Type - Funk/RHCP

Scar Tissue - Red Hot Chili Peppers

Monarchy of Roses - Red Hot Chili Peppers

Blood Sugar Sex Magik - Red Hot Chili Peppers

Under the Bridge - Red Hot Chili Peppers

I could Have Lied - Red Hot Chili Peppers

2nd Genre/Type - Games/Disney

The entire fan inspired 'Songs we Heard in Ilomilo' album

http://songsweheardinilomilo.bandcamp.com/

(send an inquiry for the download)

The entire 'Ilomilo' Official game soundtrack :3 - Daniel Olsen

Married Life - Michael Giacchino

Anything from Tarzan - Phil Collins

Anything from Hercules - Disney

Anything from Lion King - Disney

Anything by Hans Zimmer

Hwaiian Roller Coaster Ride Song - Lilo and Stitch the Movie

3rd Genre/Type Electronic

ANYTHING from C418

c418.bandcamp.com

Most anything Gorillaz

Mali Music - Damon Albarn (who made the gorillaz >_>)

4rth GenreType - Classic Rock/Rock

Rooster - Alice in Chains

Big Shot - Billy Joel

No Sugar Tonight - The Guess Who

Tons more I can\'t remember and haven\'t downloaded yet.

I

Love

Music.

Except for Rap.

Rap can go die in hole (except for any rap songs by Gorillaz :3 )

.......only 3??? gah, lol. Nope, i think your getting 4.... per mood.

depends on my mood:

Except for CRap.

fixed it for you.....and agreed.
